item.title: Music List Help
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

I Have Just Added Summoning And Disguise To Music Player, Except It Wont Show, When You Press The Music Player It Just Comes Blank Page.
Heres The Disguise Code.

/*SUMMONING*/
	public int getSummonXPForLevel(int level) {
		int points = 0;
		int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
			if (lvl >= level) {
				return output;
			}
			output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
		}
		return 0;
	}

	public int getSummonLvlForXP(int exp) {
		int points = 0;
		int output = 0;

		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 250; lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4);
			if (output >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return 250;
	}

public void addSummonXP(int amount) {
int oldLevel = getSummonLvlForXP(summonXP);
summonXP += amount;
RefreshSummonBook();
if (oldLevel < getSummonLvlForXP(summonXP)) {
summonLevel = getSummonLvlForXP(summonXP);
sendMessage("Congratulations you have advanced a Disguise level");
RefreshSummonBook();
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}


public void SummonNPC(int NPCID) { // Xerozcheez: All the summoning spells are here!

int maxSummoned = (1);

if(summonedNPCS == maxSummoned && summonLevel >= 1) {

public void RefreshSummonBook() {

sendQuest("", 963);
sendQuest("", 8934);
sendQuest("", 6272);
sendQuest("", 6271);
sendQuest("", 9926);
sendQuest("Shock Wave", 1250);
sendQuest("A spell that sends a shockwave", 1251);
sendQuest("protect nads", 704);
sendQuest("protect your nads!", 705);
sendQuest("protect sack", 701);
sendQuest("protect your sack!", 702);
sendQuest("protect clit", 712);
sendQuest("protect your clit!", 713);
sendQuest("off", 936);
sendQuest("on", 935);
sendQuest("Disguise Spells:", 5450); 
sendQuest("", 4439);
//Start of music list lol
sendQuest("@yel@Disguise Level: "+summonLevel, 3206);
sendQuest("@yel@Disguise XP: "+summonXP, 5449);
if(summonLevel >= 1)
sendQuest("@gre@Type ::normal for normal", 11941); 
else
sendQuest("Type ::normal for normal", 11941); 
if(summonLevel >= 1)
sendQuest("@gre@Man (lvl 1)", 4287); 
else
sendQuest("Man (lvl 1)", 4287); 
if(summonLevel >= 5)
sendQuest("@gre@Guard (lvl 5)", 4288);
else

else
